attributes.action: Bakewell Skatepark for a more active younger generation
attributes.background: Bakewell has few things to do for the younger generation having a skatepark would encourage more of the local children to do out door activities and as long as it stays clean and safe which I believe it will the younger generation will look after it

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to build a skate park is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise this with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
